title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.10 - Notice of safety group meetings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.10 - Notice of safety group meetings

State Regulations

The group manager shall notify the State Insurance Fund

Underwriting Director of all safety group meetings and all executive committee
meetings in writing. The notice shall set forth the location, date and time of
the meeting and be received at least 20 days in advance of the meeting. The

State Fund shall have the right to be represented at all such
meetings. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 12

451.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
